name: ior
description:
The IOR software is used for benchmarking parallel file systems using
POSIX, MPI-IO, or HDF5 interfaces.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: parallel-netcdf
dependencies.description:
PnetCDF (Parallel netCDF) is a high-performance parallel I/O library for
accessing files in format compatibility with Unidata's NetCDF,
specifically the formats of CDF-1, 2, and 5.
